title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Monitoring Large-Scale Health Science Class Participation Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learner engagement patterns are identified with 85% accuracy through analysis of Learning Management System (LMS) data

Applying an action learning research approach (problem definition → hypothesis → implementation → evaluation), learners will analyze and revise three learner support strategies (e.g., mentoring frequency, content difficulty, feedback methods) every two weeks, achieving an average of 4.0 or higher on satisfaction surveys (5-point scale) after implementing revised strategies
Early detection rates for low-engagement learners are improved to 90% based on learning analytics results
Learners develop the ability to create reports analyzing correlations between individual learning activity logs and assessment outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
